original_text: But I found that he had done nothing deserving death. And as he himself appealed to the emperor, I decided to go ahead and send him.
korean_text: 내가 살피건대 죽일 죄를 범한 일이 없더이다 그러나 그가 황제에게 상소한 고로 보내기로 결정하였나이다

sentences.original_text: But I found that he had done nothing deserving death.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 나는 그가 사형에 해당하는 아무것도 하지 않았다는 것을 발견했습니다.

sentences.original_text: And as he himself appealed to the emperor,
I decided to go ahead and send him.
